members.name: getIndex
members.comment: Returns the index where dropped data should be placed in the list. Interpretation of the value depends on the drop mode set on the associated component. If the drop mode is either DropMode.USE_SELECTION or DropMode.ON, the return value is an index of a row in the list. If the drop mode is DropMode.INSERT, the return value refers to the index where the data should be inserted. If the drop mode is DropMode.ON_OR_INSERT, the value of isInsert() indicates whether the index is an index of a row, or an insert index. -1 indicates that the drop occurred over empty space, and no index could be calculated.

members.name: isInsert
members.comment: Returns whether or not this location represents an insert location.

return: whether or not this is an insert location

members.name: toString
members.comment: Returns a string representation of this drop location. This method is intended to be used for debugging purposes, and the content and format of the returned string may vary between implementations.

return: a string representation of this drop location

name: javax.swing.JList$DropLocation
comment: A subclass of TransferHandler.DropLocation representing a drop location for a JList.
